thread.title: An Excellent Location and Hotel -
thread.title_full: An Excellent Location and Hotel - Review of Hotel Brighton - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Joseph H
title: An Excellent Location and Hotel -
text:
The Brighton was lovely. The location is excellent and is set across the street from the Tuileries And the Tuileries Metro as well. Overall a great experience. The staff could not be more accommodating and friendly.
Room Tip: Ask for the Rivoli side if you want a view of the Gardens, but the back was also quiet. See more room tips
